amendment.description: To provide for a General Accounting Office study on subtitle D of the Energy Employees Occupational Illness Compensation Program Act.

vote.text: Amendment SA 37 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 37 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Bunning. (consideration: CR S1412-1416; text: CR S1413) To provide for a General Accounting Office study on subtitle D of the Energy Employees Occupational Illness Compensation Program Act.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 37 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 37 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Bunning.
